items.text: full on off stump, and he drives this down the ground  - past the non-striker - to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, 1 run

items.text: full-ish outside off, and Mathews sticks his bat out and taps this square to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, no run

items.preText: Lasan Rashmika: "A wicket straight after the drinks break, As it always happen throughout the history of cricket,"
items.text: short on leg, and pulled comfortably off the back foot to deep backward square
items.postText: ravi.mathur15@g: "Rajat Bhatia - -The boy who made career out of dibbly dobblies"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to NLTC Perera, 1 run

items.text: plumb! Rubel strikes in his first over, just as he does so very often. Length ball on off stump angling in, and Mathews misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg, and impact's on middle stump. Question marks over the height, but umpire Erasmus thought that was out, and therefore Mathews must go back
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mathews, OUT

dismissal.text: AD Mathews lbw b Rubel Hossain 16 (34b 0x4 0x6) SR: 47.05

items.text: good length on off stump, and that's been fended off the back foot by the new batsman
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, and he steers a late cut past the diving fielder at point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, and Thisara punches this straight past the bowler. Stopped by mid off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to NLTC Perera, no run

items.text: full on off, and that's been drilled through the covers! Just a small step forward, and driven to the off-side boundary off the front foot
items.postText: Vivek: "i clicked on Dilruwan profile and found out he is of 36 years seriously or bug?" -- He's 36 indeed, but I guess that's why someone smart once said 'never judge a book by it's cover'
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to NLTC Perera, FOUR runs

items.preText: Lasan Rashmika: "Sangakkara needs to come out from the commentry box to save the SL team.."
items.text: full just outside off, and spinning into Dilruwan. Takes a big stride forward and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: full on middle, and spinning down the leg side. But the ball hits Dilruwan's pads, and trickles down to the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDK Perera, 1 leg bye

items.text: length ball outside off, and turning awayfrom the left-hander. He backs away and tries to cut, but the ball goes under his bat and through to the keeper
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, no run

items.text: bat first or pad first? That's the question, and Bangladesh are reviewing this! Length ball skids into Perera's body as he tries to cut. Manage to play the cut to point, but Mehidy wants the review. Oh man, this is a complete waste. The ball never hit his pads.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, no run

items.text: sliced to Rubel at point! Tosses this up outside off, and Perera wants to go for the biggie. Tries to slog across the line, and his attempted shot has been top-edged to the infielder
items.postText: Naseef: "Miraz will be a relieved man there!!"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, OUT

dismissal.text: NLTC Perera c Rubel Hossain b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 6 (9b 1x4 0x6) SR: 66.66

items.text: full and wide outside off, and this one skids through from Mehidy. The batsman's attempted cut doesn't come off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lakmal, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, and fended off the back foot by Dilruwan
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he slaps this past point to the fielder in the deep
items.postText: Hira Pradhan: "I am great fan of Cricket but there is injustice from ICC for Asian ODI Countries like Nepal & UAE. They should get chance directly Asia Cup - 2018. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and fended off the front foot.

items.text: good length outside off, and blocked towards the off side

items.text: just short of midwicket Length ball on middle, and he pulls this almost into the hands of the diving Nazmul Hossain

items.text: good length outside off, and the cut has been hit past the infield to the fielder manning the boundary
items.postText: Sarang: "@Sreshth, looks like SL innings entered sudden death (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ljLScg7fjE) a while ago " -- oh man, that video has just made me nostalgic.

items.text: full on middle, and he launches into a huuuuge six over the cow-corner boundary. Down on one knee, and swats this full-pitched ball for a maximum
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lakmal, SIX runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he drives against the spin to mid off

items.text: good length on off, and he flicks this off his hips to deep midwicket
